projects.title: Line Follower Robot
projects.description: Engineered a Line Follower bot utilizing Arduino Nano, an 8-IR sensor array and L298N motor driver for precise path detection. Implemented PID control algorithms for stable navigation and optimized performance under diverse operating conditions.

projects.title: 2D Snake Game
projects.description: Created a 2D Snake Game using Java Swing and AWT, marking my first experience with Java GUI development. Features collision detection system, dynamic gameplay scenarios, and smooth responsive controls.

projects.title: Dobosaurus Game
projects.description: Developed a Chrome Dino game clone with smooth gameplay, responsive controls, and engaging UI elements. Features dynamic background, varying obstacle sizes for visual depth, and high-score tracking system.

projects.title: Embedded PCB Solutions
projects.description: Working on embedded systems using CuPID development boards (C2, C6, H2, etc.). Designing, prototyping, and programming solutions for production-ready PCBs with precision control and scalable applications in real-world environments.

projects.title: Kicad_SVG_Converter
projects.description: Built a CLI tool that makes cool and efficient PCB vector images.
